a1: Yes, you need a microphone connected to your device. Most laptops and smartphones have built-in microphones. The browser will ask for permission to access it.
q2: What format are recordings saved in?
a2: Recordings are saved in WebM audio format, which is supported by all modern browsers and most audio players. You can convert to other formats using audio conversion tools.
a3: No. The recording is processed entirely in your browser and is never uploaded to any server. Only you have access to your recordings.
